message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this amazing product that I believe will be highly valuable to you. I'm offering it to you for $14,000. It's a great deal considering its worth, and I'm confident it will exceed your expectations.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only able to offer $13,000 for it.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer, but $13,000 is a bit too low for me.  I'm willing to come down a little further to $13,500. This is a fair price considering the value the product holds for you.  Let's see if we can reach a deal.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I understand the value of the product and would like to propose a price of $13,200.
